greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangular array 2*P - P^-1, where P is Pascal's triangle A007318.
comment: Row reversed version of A124846. For the signless version of the inverse array and its connection with sums of powers of odd integers see A162313.
formula: The e.g.f. can also be written as
(3)... exp(x*t)/G(-t), where G(t) = exp(t)/(2-exp(2*t)) is the e.g.f.
The row polynomials form an Appell sequence of polynomials.
maple: for n from 0 to 10 do seq(T(n,k), k = 0..n) od;
xref: A007318, A151821 (row sums), A080253, A124846, A162313 (unsigned matrix inverse).
results.author: _Peter Bala_, Jul 01 2009
ext: Row sums corrected by _Peter Bala_, Apr 01 2010
